item.title: ReactOS has been accepted for GSOC'17
item.description: The ReactOS Team is proud to announce that Google has once again selected the ReactOS project to be part in the upcoming 2017 Google Summer of Code. This is the first time ReactOS has been accepted for GSOC two years consecutively, setting an important landmark in ReactOSâ€™ history. No doubt the amazing work of the ReactOS mentors and students in the 2016 program contributed to make this possible. The GSOC program is a great opportunity to join recognized and skilled mentors with eager and skilled students alike.
